list.name: LASER-MODE
list.description: Buzz Lightyear's laser has extended range, allowing him to hit targets from farther away.
list.descriptionHtml: Buzz Lightyear's laser has extended range, allowing him to hit targets from farther away.

list.name: SABER-MODE
list.description: Buzz Lightyear charges his Super by absorbing damage taken and benefits from increased health.
list.descriptionHtml: Buzz Lightyear charges his Super by absorbing damage taken and benefits from increased health.

list.name: WING-MODE
list.description: Buzz deploys his wings, gaining a boost in movement speed.
list.descriptionHtml: Buzz deploys his wings, gaining a boost in movement speed.
